scripts.build: npm run build:module && npm run build:plugin && npm run build:cli && npm run build:widget
scripts.build:widget: cd widget && npx expo export --platform ios --output-dir ../ios/widget-export --no-bytecode && cp ../ios/widget-export/_expo/static/js/ios/*.js ../ios/widget.jsbundle && rm -rf ../ios/widget-export
scripts.clean: rm -rf build plugin/build cli/dist && expo-module clean
scripts.typecheck: tsc --noEmit && cd cli && tsc --noEmit && cd ../plugin && tsc --noEmit
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run typecheck
scripts.version:sync: node -e "const pkg = require('./package.json'); const alias = require('./packages/expo-air/package.json'); alias.version = pkg.version; alias.dependencies['@10play/expo-air'] = '^' + pkg.version; require('fs').writeFileSync('./packages/expo-air/package.json', JSON.stringify(alias, null, 2) + '\n');"
scripts.dev: cd cli && npx tsx bin/expo-air.ts dev
scripts.cli:start: cd cli && npx tsx bin/expo-air.ts start
scripts.setup: npm install && cd widget && npm install && cd ../example && npm install
